snippet: A senior U.S. official, denying Syria’s claim, said a Russian plane may have errantly bombed a Syrian base. Russia had no immediate comment.
abstract: Syria accuses United States-led coalition of bombing Syrian military installations; US denies accusation and suggests Russia was responsible.

byline.original: By HWAIDA SAAD and ERIC SCHMITT
byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad reported from Beirut, and Eric Schmitt from Washington. Kareem Fahim contributed reporting from Cairo, Anne Barnard from Beirut, and Ivan Nechepurenko from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: A senior U.S. official, denying Syria’s claim, said a Russian plane may have errantly bombed a Syrian base. Russia had no immediate comment.

headline.main: Syria Blames U.S. in Base Bombing, but Americans Blame Russia
headline.print_headline: Damascus Accuses U.S. Coalition of Bombing Base, but Americans Point to the Russians

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
